Featured-image: CR704-off-white-two-toned-fitted-evening-gown-with-beading_p.jpg

----

Description: Two toned fabric creates a detailed center panel that is covered with jewels cascading down to the length of the gown. The back features a cutout that trimmed with the sparkling beadwork and it continues throughout the back of the gown. This form fitting floor length gown  with a sweeping train is perfect for your red carpet event.
